manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Trusted Since 1882. Once Tried, Always Used.

Use Coffee Maker Cleaner in: Single Cup Coffee Maker Keurigs and other single cup coffee makers can benefit from the cleaning power of BKF Coffee Maker Cleaner. Automatic Drip Coffee Maker Improve everyday brewing with BKF Coffee Maker Cleaner. Remove tannins and oily residue for fresher tasting coffee. Espresso Machine Those morning lattes can taste more delicious than ever before. Use BKF Coffee Maker Cleaner in your espresso machine. Coffee Carafes BKF Coffee Maker Cleaner can be used to clean your coffee pots and carafes too. Follow instructions on the bottle.

Coffee Maker Cleaner Soft Cleanser Cookware Cleanser & Polish Cooktop Cleaner Stainless Steel Cleaner & Polish Granite & Stone Cleaner & Polish Key Ingredient(s) Sodium Metasilicate, Glycerin, Acrylic Polymer, Ethoxylated Fatty Alcohol Oxalic Acid Oxalic Acid Polymeric Dispersant, Xanthan Gum Mineral Oil Isopropyl Alcohol Purpose Removes oily residue from coffee makers. Cleans rust, stains, and grime. Efficiently cleans cookware. Removes grease, stains and more. Effectively cleans glass and ceramic cooktops. Gently cleans stainless steel surfaces. Great for daily use. Gently cleans granite and stone surfaces. Great for daily use. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Stuff Works!
reviews.reviewText: Trying to keep the coffee pot and the drink mugs free of coffee stains was a monumental task. The carafe in particular was difficult to clean because we simply don't do it often enough.I was going to run some citric acid through the coffee maker and thought this might be a good time to clean the carafe and our thermos bottles. It worked very well on both of them!The only downside is that I had to use almost the whole bottle in one pass, so it's a bit expensive. I think I'll keep buying it though since it does do a tremendous job of cleaning up coffee stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well!
reviews.reviewText: I’m impressed how well this worked on both tea and coffee stains. Will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love Bar Keepers Friend. Use the powder form all the time, and it works great. However, I wanted to descale the plastic water reservoir in my BiPap machine. Didn’t work at all. Oh, well. It did work beautifully in my coffee carafe and my coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works well but doesn't go far
reviews.reviewText: I have a 12C drip brewer so this required the entire bottle when used according to instructions. Note that I did not follow the instructions on the Amazon page. I put the cleaner in the pot and filled to the top with hot tap water and let it set about 45 minutes. The result was that most of the staining was removed and I was able to remove the rest by brushing lightly with a bottle brush.I'm entirely satisfied with the results but at this cost I probably won;t be using the product often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as stated
reviews.reviewText: Used on a stainless steel coffee mug. I use the mug for black coffee so it gets heavily stained. This stuff leaves it looking like brand new. It does not work at all on the plastic pour spout but that's not surprising. I.think once plastic stains, that's it. I will buy this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works but it's quite strong
reviews.reviewText: It really cleaned my coffee pot! It was exceptional in doing that. However, it is very strong stuff. I accidentally got it on my hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work as well as I had hoped
reviews.reviewText: 2023-12-27: I used the whole bottle in a old Curtis ThermoPro 2.5 L coffee dispenser. I poured in boiling water and let it sit overnight. Then rinsed thoroughly. Although the stale coffee smell was reduced considerably, the smell is still noticeable. I'm not sure if another treatment will improve the situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Removed 20 years of staining from coffee carafe in a snap!
reviews.reviewText: My stainless steel coffee thermal carafe is over 20 years old and had never been cleaned with anything other than warm soapy water. After that amount of time and 1000's of uses, the carafe was completely coated with coffee oils and stains and was darker than my darkest brew in the dead of a moonless night.Scrubbing with dish soap and hot water wouldn't touch that mess, nor would the normal cleaners used to descale and clean my coffee maker. So, I decided to try this. After adding the recommended amount of this cleaner to the carafe and then filling it to the brim with boiling water, I let it "steep" for 1/2 hour. When I dumped the cleaning solution it was darker than my morning coffee and, after the lightest of scrubs , the inside of the carafe was as bright and shiny as the day I purchased it. Using this was easy and the results were perfect. Yes, it's pricy but it 100% delivered what it promised, and for me that earns 5 stars.

reviews.reviewTitle: Interior of stainless steel pot looked like new
reviews.reviewText: Even though this is designed to clean the whole coffee maker, I only used it on the pot. Letting the water mixed with the appropriate amount of cleaning solution sit in the pot for about an hour was enough to remove all the stubborn coffee stains in the pot. I did use a round sponge scrubber on an long handle to reach all the areas of the interior because it was not possible to reach in with my hand. Overall, I was very happy with the final result.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cleaned my coffee pot SO well!
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how amazingly this worked! My pot somehow got very stained and nothing would clean it. I was worried I'd have to replace it and got this as a last try. It made it so shiny that I had to polish the rest of my coffee maker! It all looks so great now!

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than anything I've tried before
reviews.reviewText: Wow, did an amazing job. The before picture is after cleaning with soap, vinegar, and CLR. I was getting a really bad taste from coffee made in the pot and no amount of normal cleaning made much of a difference. One treatment for half hour did the trick with bar keepers friend. Very happy with the results.
Item arrived with a broken seal. It had leaked all over the packaging.
